events.name: I/O Extended 2017 New Cairo

venue.name: Vintage Coworking Space
venue.address_1: Infront of El-Hamd Mosque, Akhnaton Street, Fifth Settlement, New Cairo City

events.description:
GDG New Cairo proudly presents a live viewing party for Google's most anticipated conference this year; I/O 2017 live from the Shoreline Amphitheater in San Francisco.

I/O Extended 2017 - New Cairo will be held on Wednesday the 17th of May 2017 (17/5/2017) from 4:30 PM at Vintage Coworking Space in New Cairo City.

I/O 2017:

https://events.google.com/io/ I/O Extended events bring local developer communities together to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, around the globe.

Registration Link:

https://goo.gl/forms/4hWIz35mSavsGxkh1

- The event is for FREE! üéâüî•

Facebook Event: https://www.facebook.com/events/1522562984441118

Wait for our surprise gifts. üéÅ üéä

For any enquires, feel free to contact us at: [masked] or through our Facebook page messages.

events.description:
GDG New Cairo is proudly presenting its first workshop for Android Development titled "Kreate, Kompile, Kotlin" using the new Android first-class language "Kotlin" at Via Coworking Space (https://www.facebook.com/viaspace/) in Nasr City. üî•üôà

Agenda:

4:00 pm - 4:30 pm: Registration

4:30 pm - 5:00 pm: GDG Introduction

5:00 pm - 6:00 pm: Introduction to Kotlin by Tarek Abdul-Kader

6:00 pm - 6:30 pm: Coffee Break

6:30 pm - 7:30 pm: Kotlin for Android Workshop by Shady Selim

7:30 pm - 8:00 pm: Networking & Closing

‚ö†Ô∏è By joining this Meetup event, you are automatically added to the attendees list.

Facebook Event: https://www.facebook.com/events/105537826780426 ( https://www.facebook.com/events/105537826780426 )

For more information, don't hesitate to contact us through Meetup or Facebook.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gdgnewcairo ( https://www.facebook.com/gdgnewcairo )

#GDG #Android #Kreate #Kompile #Kotlin #Workshop

events.name: GDG DevFest Cairo 2017
events.description:
For the first time ever, Cairo‚Äôs GDGs are teaming up to bring you an extraordinary and a once in a life time experience during the annual GDG DevFest Cairo 2017 marking the fifth GDG DevFest organized in Cairo brought to you by GDG Cairo, GDG New Cairo, and GDG Shorouk. üî•üí•üåü¬†

The event will be hosted at The GrEEK Campus on the 3rd and 4th of November, 2017. (3-4/11/2017)

GDG DevFests are large, community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google‚Äôs technologies.

More about GDG DevFests:¬†https://developers.google.com/events/devfest

A wide range of topics will be discussed including Android, PWA, Polymer, AMP, Javascript, Node.js, Firebase, Python, Actions on Google, and Angular given by professional speakers and developers in their respective fields.

Registration:¬†https://goo.gl/forms/gkBQqliWj5mWtKso1

Facebook Event:¬†https://www.facebook.com/events/125057828156851

Don‚Äôt miss the chance, and register now! üôåüèª

‚ö†Ô∏è Places are limited.¬†

#GDG¬†#DevFest¬†#DevFest17¬†#DevFestCairo

events.name: Gate to the Future | GDG New Cairo at GUC
events.description:
‚Ä¢ What we'll do
GDG New Cairo is extremely proud to celebrate its first generation of the volunteers of GDG New Cairo at GUC by organizing an opening ceremony for them titled "Gate to the Future" on Tuesday the 21st of November, 2017.

We at GDG New Cairo believe that raising the volunteers spirit will lead to a better outcome and output by them which will affect the quality and organization of our future events.

GDG New Cairo at GUC is a team running under GDG New Cairo that focuses on the German University in Cairo community by sharing with them on campus the latest advancements in the world of software and hardware technologies released by multiple companies.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GDG.NewCairo

‚Ä¢ Important to know
Dress Code: Formal.

events.name: Web Study Jam 2018 - Google Mobile Sites Certification

venue.name: Eco Coworking Space
venue.address_1: 8 El Shaheed Mohamed Abd El Hady St., El Thawra St., Heliopolis, Cairo, Egypt

events.description:
‚Ä¢ What we'll do
GDG New Cairo is back with its first event for 2018 on Saturday 24/3/2018. üôåüèªüî•üí•

Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small-screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on desktop. But making the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills.

Therefore, we are proudly organizing a session to teach the basics and fundamentals of the Google Mobile Site Certification course so our attendees can learn how to make websites be smartphone ready.

‚Ä¢ What is Mobile Site Certification
A professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate understanding in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development.

The registration is by clicking on "going".

‚Ä¢ Location
The event location will be announced soon.

‚Ä¢ Registration
By clicking on "Going" on this Meetup event, you'll be added automatically to the attendees list.

‚Ä¢ Important to know
After passing the exam, you will receive an online certificate from Google.

events.name: Messenger Bot Basics 101

venue.name: Vintage Coworking Space
venue.address_1: Infront of El-Hamd Mosque, Akhnaton Street, Fifth Settlement, New Cairo City

events.description:
After our amazing start of the year with the Web Study Jam 2018 session, we are back with our second event of 2018 titled "Messenger Bot Basics 101" in collaboration with InstaBot on Saturday 7/4/2018. üî•üôåüèª

In our workshop, you will learn the basic concepts and fundamentals of creating bots on the Facebook Messenger platforms.

This is a coding workshop, so don't forget to bring your laptops with you.

‚Ä¢ What are Facebook Messenger Bots
Messenger bots are autonomous digital messages that can answer questions, provide automated responses and be programmed with simple AI.

‚Ä¢ Location
Vintage Coworking Space
Location: https://web.facebook.com/vintagecoworkingspace/

Registration:
By clicking on "going" on our Meetup event, you will be added to the attendees list automatically.

The event is for free as usual. üòÑ

#GDG #MessengerBot #Facebook

events.name: I/O Extended and IWD 2018 New Cairo
events.description:
GDG New Cairo is proudly organizing for the first time ever a mashup event that includes I/O Extended 2018 New Cairo and International Women's Day 2018 New Cairo on the same day!

All the details will be announced on our Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/110598986295714/

Registration: https://goo.gl/forms/qhpA496ZcIisoQel2

=======================================================================
I/O Extended 2018 New Cairo

I/O Extended events bring local developer communities together to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, around the globe. It helps developers from around the world take part in the I/O experience. Various tech-talks, sessions, workshops, and codelabs about the latest technologies will be presented during the event.

Google I/O: https://events.google.com/io/

=======================================================================
International Women's Day 2018 New Cairo - Building a New Horizon

Google's Women Techmakers program provides visibility, community, and resources for women in technology. By participating in International Women‚Äôs Day you will hear inspiring stories, learn hands-on via design sprints and codelabs, and celebrate women in technology.

Women Techmakers: https://www.womentechmakers.com

=======================================================================
Don't forget to bring your laptops fully charged with you.

For more information, visit us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/gdgnewcairo

#GDG #IO #IWD #WTM #THENEXTBIGTHING

events.name: Join The Cloud '19 | GDG New Cairo at GUC
events.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è EMERGENCY BROADCAST SYSTEM ‚ö†Ô∏è

This is not a test.

This is your Emergency Broadcast System announcing the commencement of the Annual GUC Recruitment sanctioned by GDG New Cairo.

The Cloud consists of the following organizational committees:

2. Quality Control üåß

events.name: DevFest Egypt '18

venue.name: Dar Al Diafa Ain Shams
venue.address_2: El-Qobba Bridge, Al Walili, Cairo Governorate

events.description:
Registration Form: https://goo.gl/EamAoK
Facebook Page: https://web.facebook.com/DevFestEgypt/
Facebook Event: https://web.facebook.com/events/1555468525300697/

---------
BIGGER!! BETTER!!
------
The biggest DevFest is here!
Google Developer Groups (GDG) and Women Techmakers (WTM) are excited to announce GDG DevFest Egypt for 2 awesome days üåüüåüüå†
For the first time 5 GDGs are collaborating to bring you the best DevFest, Plus,
.
.
Wait for it üòÄ
.
a Hackathon!!

------

GDG DevFest is an annual event hosted by Google to highlight the latest in technology, product innovation and initiatives.
GDG DevFests are community-run events that offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, hack-a-thons, codelabs, and more

We will cover some exciting topics including:
-UX
-PWA
-Flutter
-Firebase
-Product Strategy
-Android
and more...

--------

-$$: The event is free of charge.

YOUR REGISTRATION IS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OR REJECTION ACCORDING TO YOUR RESPONSES AND SEATS AVAILABILITY! SO PLEASE WAIT FOR A CONFIRMATION MESSAGE FROM US BEFORE COMMITTING TO THE EVENT.
#EgyptDevFest18 #DevFest18 #DevFestMENA #GDG #WTM #Flutter

events.name: IoT (Internet of Things) Study Jams & TOT
events.description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
IoT (Internet of Things) Study Jams & TOT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Registration required on the official website
https://events.withgoogle.com/study-jams-tot/

‚û° Dev Ecosystem Study Jams
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Study Jams are study groups complementary to Google Developers Roadshow MENA events, ran by Dev Ecosystem MENA with content from Google Developers.

The objective of the Study Jams is to increase the technical competence of the members of our community through face-to-face courses.

These trainings give the members of our community a series of skills that can be used for personal and professional development.

Join us in the second edition of Study Jams MENA!

--------------------------------------------------------------
##########################################
--------------------------------------------------------------

‚û° Training Of Trainers
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
TOT is important, because any trainer needs two separate sets of skills and knowledge; The topic they are teaching (subject matter expertise); And the know-how of transferring that information to the student (instructional expertise). Instructors need both of these sets of skills, and we train you on both.

The goal of the Training of Trainers (TOT) process is to give new trainers the background knowledge, skills and practical experience to provide communities the training and technical assistance they need.

These trainings ensures that communities have their qualified local trainers, who can conduct these workshops in a scalable & self-sustainable way.

‚û°You can enroll now with commitment & dedication!

organizers.bio: Hello! üëãüèª .. I'm a guy who's passionate about the latest technologies with side hobbies such as writing, listening to music and watching sports. Currently I'm a computer science and engineering student at the German University in Cairo.
